actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to amend section 7 of the Mineral Leasing Act governing Federal coal lease royalty rates.
short_title: Consumer Coal Royalty Rate Amendment Act of 1989

summary.text: Consumer Coal Royalty Rate Amendment Act of 1989 - Amends the Mineral Lands Leasing Act to reduce the royalty rate for pre-March 1, 1989, Federal coal lease contracts from 12 1/2 percent to six percent.

titles.title: Consumer Coal Royalty Rate Amendment Act of 1989
A bill to amend section 7 of the Mineral Leasing Act governing Federal coal lease royalty rates.
